title: If you love somebody, you love them. My parents had a 25-year age gap between them and my mum was the breadwinner, my dad the house husband. I'm a strong believer that a good relationship can work, whatever the situation.
author: Katherine Jenkins

title: My father's father died when he was a teenager, and dad went to work to support his mother and two siblings as a carpenter and as a builder's mule, hauling carts of lumber to construction sites when it was too icy for the mules to climb the hills.
author: Maryanne Trump Barry

title: All my life, men have told me I wasn't pretty enough - even the men I was dating. And I'd be like, 'Well, why are you with me, then?' It's always been men putting me down just like my dad. To this day when someone says I'm cute, I can't see it. I don't see it no matter what anybody says.

title: My dad's a Pentecostal minister, meaning that he's full of charisma. If he's telling a story about Noah's ark, you best know each tiger is going to be having their own little conversation and narrative.

title: It's all too easy to say, 'You didn't have a dad, therefore, you married an older man.' Listen, I didn't marry my dad. My dad is much younger than my husband.

title: I come from an ordinary family - my dad is a carpenter, a roof-maker - and we've always loved racing together.

author: 6lack

title: I got stuck on the Peter Pan ride when I was nine years old with my dad at Disney World. author: Jason Fuchs

title: My mom's family is Russian Jewish, and my dad's Puerto Rico Catholic, so it's kind of a weird mix.

title: Without my dad, mum and siblings I wouldn't be here. Everything they did for me, I'm so thankful.
author: Steven Bergwijn

author: Kid Cudi

title: My dad was a diehard Cowboys fan. I was raised as a Cowboy fan, and I was forced to be a Cowboy fan.

title: When I grew up, my dad always used to watch 'Star Trek' and any and every sci-fi show you could imagine. I used to watch it with him, and I loved it.

title: I grew up thinking that it's okay to be sad, angry, and express your emotions. I have also banged doors and fought, as I have seen my mom do that when she would fight with my dad. Everything that I've learnt is from them, so I've never struggled to express myself.

title: I grew up with a truck. My dad had one, so I like trucks.

title: My dad died from pancreatic cancer at 54... I'm making sure I'm eating my vegetables and staying away from the red meat.
author: Chumlee

title: I knew 'Hurt' way before Dad recorded it. In 1992, 'Downward Spiral' was one of my favorite albums.

title: I had a very lovely childhood, and, being an only child, I'm very close to my mom and my dad.

title: I got a horse when I was eight or 10 years old. And dad used to take me to the rodeo back home. I got into it big time.

title: I owe a lot to my dad, just for having provided the wrestling business for us to get into.

title: No matter what, I never want to say something about Tarek that my kids would have to read about later. That's their dad, and it's not my focus to put him down.

title: Dad almost died of a heart attack in the middle of making Apocalypse Now, the biggest movie of his life. It doesn't make you want to jump into that business.

title: I remember debating the finer points of flaky pastry with my chicken-pot-pie-obsessed American dad. I remember the divine mix of Thai food, TV dinners, and hearty, homemade goodness that have shaped this palate of mine to this day. I remember all this, but I still Google my husband's birthday. Thank God he's famous.
author: Chrissy Teigen

title: If you haven't heard my story, my mom is full Korean, and my dad is Caucasian. Kids in kindergarten would make fun of me for being Asian, and when you're that age, you don't know really how to process that; the way you take that is, 'Who I am isn't good enough.'
author: Joanna Gaines

title: I could not tell you the date of my mother's death. I could not tell you the date of my dad's death. These are not dates that I find significant.

title: I think he would have been proud and smiling... when we laid him to rest because his family was together. I think that was a great gift to be able to give Dad at the end.
author: Michael Reagan

title: My dad is not a sports guy but was drawn to the theatrics of wrestling.
author: John Cena

title: A kid is something precious, and you want to protect it and keep it fun. I'm not a dad, but I've seen people and how they behave with their kids.
author: Jason Statham

title: Mum and Dad had waited 16 years for adoption laws to change in their home state, Tasmania, so that they could apply to the authorities to create the family of their dreams. author: Saroo Brierley

title: The worst present I got was when I was 10. I had specifically wished for a Barbie horse. My dad got me a cheap, poorly made version of it and I cried all evening.

title: My dad wanted me to have a better life than he had ever had. He wanted us to succeed so badly. And I never wanted to let him down.
author: Lewis Hamilton

title: My dad would always play Mariah Carey, Whitney Houston, and Anita Baker, so I fell in love with them. I would try to make my voice sound like theirs.
author: Ari Lennox

title: Both of my parents are actors and directors and whatnot. My dad loves really solid, old school, Broadway musicals, and one of them is 'Assassins' by Stephen Sondheim. All of the successful or non-successful assassins that have ever existed in the United States come together, and they talk about their killing or attempts through songs.
author: Will Rothhaar

title: My folks were busy. My dad was a teacher, and it was during the Second World War, and my mother was working. So I got my stories from films and books. I read a lot, and I love to read to this day.
author: Robert Osborne

title: When my dad toured in '91, I think my first gig properly was the Tokyo Dome, 50,000 people indoors. That was pretty scary. I was 12, or 13.
author: Dhani Harrison

title: One thing my dad always told me, was he would make sure I always had what he didn't have. He couldn't play basketball because he didn't have tennis shoes - so I had five pairs of tennis shoes.
author: Robert Griffin III

title: My dad was very explosive, God rest his soul. author: Boy George

title: My dad's a professor of medicine; my mum was a nurse. My little sister is going into healthcare. My older sister is a nurse; my brother's in finance - I'm the runt of the litter.
author: Will Poulter

title: There's a lot of wisdom that my dad and my grandparents and my uncle have been able to impart on me, and what I've treasured the most is I've seen examples in my life of people embracing their creativity, not feeling insecure about their artistic inclinations.
author: Bryce Dallas Howard

title: I miss my mom and dad. They brought me into this world and I wish they were with me on my birthday. So I don't celebrate it much.
author: Sonu Sood

author: Mia Goth

title: My dad knows how to tell a story. He'd make me laugh by doing all the different voices.
author: Lily Collins

title: We all started snowboarding in the beginning as a family just to be closer together, go on trips. It was our soccer, but instead of Dad yelling at me from the sideline he is there riding with me and hitting the jumps even before I am hitting them.

title: My dad had a personal style which was very attractive. It was quite reserved and quite elegant, and it was infectious.

author: Dan Amboyer

title: As a child my life felt like an adventure, because my dad is such a fun guy. I had a brother and sister who were in and out of hospital a lot – one had a congenital heart problem and the other had a cleft palate. But my parents never stopped smiling.
author: Nadiya Hussain
